boardgame.name: Ligretto
Star Wars Rebels Ligretto
Wijokapre
Блиц
樂可多
boardgame.description: In Ligretto, each player has his own deck of forty cards, with cards 1-10 in four colors and a unique symbol on the back to identify which cards are his. At the start of each round, each player lays out 3-5 cards (depending on the number of players) face up in front of him to create his row; places a face-up stack of ten cards, seeing only the top card, next to his row to create his Ligretto stack; and holds the remaining cards in hand face down._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Playing at the same time, each player tries to empty his Ligretto stack. If he has a 1 on the top of any face-up stack, he plays it to the center of the table. If he has a 2 of the same color as any 1 in the center of the table, he can place the 2 on the 1. All cards in the central piles must be played in ascending order and must be the same color._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;If a player can't play anything, he can reveal cards from the stack in his hand, counting them out in groups of three, then laying them face up while revealing only the top card. He can play this top card onto a central pile as long as he meets the rules for doing so._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;As soon as a player empties his Ligretto stack, the round ends. Each player scores 1 point for each of his cards among the central piles, then loses 2 points for each card remaining in his Ligretto stack. In some versions of the game, the player with the highest score wins; in other versions, players then sort all the cards and play another round, with the first player to reach 99 points winning._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A rules variant for Ligretto allows a player to play cards from his Ligretto stack or the cards in hand onto the cards in his row, but only if the numbers are in descending order and the colors of adjacent cards are not identical._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

This is a special 15th anniversary edition of the german version Ligretto which comes in a nice metal box instead of the usual paper one. Game is still in the original shrinkwrap. Shipping at actual cost dependend on destination, total weight and method of shipment chosen.
German Ligretto edition. Still in shrink. Red edition. Shipping is 4.80$ within U.S., insurance 1.30$ opotional.
Game is brand new in shrink wrap. Item shipped USPS within 3 days of receiving payment. If you have any questions, please email. For more info/items, visit www.covenantgames.com

I´m offering LIGRETTO green or blue --- new and in shrink --- You´ve got the choice ! This game is provided with english rules. Shipping is EUR 6.00 within Europe or EUR 7.00 worldwide. The delivery time varies from 1 to 4 weeks. I can offer even more games upon request. Please also check listings of my friend montsegur - combined regular shipping is possible. For more details on my USA and Canada special shipping offer please click robbirob and then the more info button.
Also have a copy that has been played once. Fun game and great filler.

Complete _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Excellent clean condition. Box is undamaged with only very minor facial markings (from a rubber band) on a couple of the cards. Reasonable offers will be considered. I can combine multiple purchases to reduce shipping costs. Shipping Costs: UK £2, Europe £2, USA £3

Playroom Entertainment* This listing is for only one set, please contact us to determine which product(s) and quantity. Playroom Entertainment (PLE32100) $8.49 [Ligretto Blue Set] Playroom Entertainment (PLE32200) $8.49 [Ligretto Red Set] Playroom Entertainment (PLE32300) $8.49 [Ligretto Green Set] ** Ligretto is a fast-moving game, where you must get rid of your Ligretto stacks as quickly as you can to be the winner. You must have fast hands and quick thinking, as the need for speed is key in this color stacking card game! All players play at the same time, so there_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s no time to lose! Add different colored decks together for a lightning-fast game for up to 12 players!

This is the often hard-to-find, true Dutch Blitz, 2005, by the Dutch Blitz Game Co.--this is not Ligretto. The box comes with 4 differently backed card colors (red,yellow,green,blue) and plays up to 4 people. This is my daughter_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s favorite card game, and there are only a few she likes.

The more desirable Playroom Entertainment_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Ligretto: Green Set. Components including cards, rules, and box insert for card storage are in like new condition. I ship quickly - within 24 hours of receiving payment. Shipping weight is 5 pounds.

I will also offer $10 off on shipping to anywhere else in the world for orders over $150.
